block.p: POLIAKOFF-Muriel. Died peacefully May 4. Beloved wife of Dr. Harvey Poliakoff. Devoted mother to Nancy (Stone) and Douglas Yoblon, Bosha Johnson-Stone and Stephen Stone. Grandmother to Kerri and Melissa. Adored sister of Elaine Axel and Louise Miller. Aunt to Susan, Jane, Blair and Carol. You will be missed, dear matriarch. Family receiving Saturday evening 6-8, services Sunday 11:30 at Frank E Campbell, 81st Street and Madison Avenue.

POLIAKOFF-Muriel. Died peacefully May 4. Beloved wife of Dr. Harvey Poliakoff. Devoted mother to Nancy (Stone) and Douglas Yoblon, Bosha Johnson-Stone and Stephen Stone. Grandmother to Kerri and Melissa. Adored sister of Elaine Axel and Louise Miller. Aunt to Susan, Jane, Blair and Carol. You will be missed, dear matriarch. Family receiving Saturday evening 6-8, services Sunday 11:30 at Frank E Campbell, 81st Street and Madison Avenue.
